Posts.Content: Though it's probably nothing, you may want to have a biopsy done for peace of mind. If you're asking for opnions, I would say to do it. You'll feel a little sore for a couple days but it is a quick, in and out procedure. I was diagnosed last year at age 32. I had no family history. The diagnotsitc ultrasound measured my "lump" at <1cm. When I had surgery a few weeks later it was 2.5cm.
Posts.Title: Breast Lump
